summary: A comedy romance movie about the last generation of youths and their passionate romance based in Hongseong, Chungcheong Namdo in the 1980's.
cast: Park Bo-Young|Da-Sol Han|Lee Jong-Suk|Hee-won Kim|Hae-hyo Kwon|Se-yeong Lee|Jung-min Park|Mi-ran Ra|Hyun-tak Shin|Jin So-Yeon|Jun Soo Jin|Kim Soo-Oh|Won Joon Yoon|Kim Young-kwang
title: Pik-keulh-neun cheong-chun
